solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int jump(int[] A) {--newline--        int sc = 0;--newline--        int e = 0;--newline--        int max = 0;--newline--        for(int i=0; i<A.length-1; i++) {--newline--            max = Math.max(max, i+A[i]);--newline--            if( i == e ) {--newline--                sc++;--newline--                e = max;--newline--            } --newline--        }--newline--        return sc;--newline--    }--newline--}
